website_summaries.verdict: An inconspicuous toy box that can be used in any room. Excellent value for anyone in need of an affordable storage solution for general areas.
pros: Collapsible construction saves space when not in use, yet is surprisingly sturdy
Neutral design and a roomy interior make it easy to keep things neat and tidy
Lightweight flip-up lid is safe and easy for little ones to operate
Comes with handles for fuss-free portability
Nylon exterior is easy to clean
cons: May buckle if used as a seat or if heavy objects are placed on the lid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This toy box is exactly what I was looking for, for baby toys we keep in our living room. it matches nicely with our furniture and fits all my 5 month olds toys, nap blankey, my carrier and her stuffed elephant . I love the lid that keeps our cat's hair and dust out. It also has Velcro closures that are a nice feature. The material feels like a thick Jean material and doesn't allow cat hair to stick on it. Overall great toy chest.
customer_reviews.author: ev

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage Chest
customer_reviews.text: What I wanted: 1. A toy storage that is safe for a toddler. Lid won't fall and child won't get stuck inside. This lid drops flat against the back. 2. A chest that would fold flat when not in use. 3. Must be large enough to hold a lot of toys without costing hundreds of dollars. 4. Neutral color. 5. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, Practical, and SAFE Toy Chest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy chest for myself, actually for my grandkids' toys. I love it. It's easy to set up in seconds, is unobtrusively attractive, holds a LOT of toys, and best of all, it's impossible for little ones to get their fingers stuck, crunched, or hurt in any way, and it's also impossible for heads and arms to get banged by the lid. Very well-made and great for any other type of storage, too. Available in other colors, as well as personalization. I liked it so much, I bought one for my daughter, who loves it as much as I do. I highly recommend this toy chest.
customer_reviews.author: sekweb

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and nicely functional.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice storage box! No cutesy markings, so it's appropriate for a living room or storage of just about anything. Be aware it is lightweight and you cannot sit or stand on it. Also, the bottom is a thin vinyl sheet and not reinforced with cardboard. Great for a toy box you plan to leave in place or for lightweight storage of yarn, winter sweaters, or blankets. Just not anything heavy. Unsure if I'd want to stack it either.
customer_reviews.author: Mom-Unit

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toy box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy box. It's surprisingly sturdy, enough so that my 3 year old son can sit on top of it. He also likes to climb in and hide, and he uses it as a table to set his cup down on and to color on. It folds up flat, which is handy for moving. It's also very deep and so can fit larger toys in it easily. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy box
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy toy box! I use this for my grand children's toys & it holds all of them . It's sturdy and has handles. I like it because it is soft enough that my grandson who i s learning to walk can nit get hurt if he falls into it. It also is safe for little fingers & if the lids closes it won't hurt them!,Totally happy with this purchase. Holds an incredible amount if you'd & is definatelywirth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I need to store the quilts and pillow ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I need to store the quilts and pillow shams that my grandmother handmade. This Collapsible Toy Chest is just perfect. It holds them perfectly. They can breath, they are protected from light, etc. They are great. The others will hold my stash of sewing supplies. They are pretty, The hard lid makes they stack nicely. Thank you for a great solution to my problem.
customer_reviews.author: L. K. Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Great For Dog Toys & Cat Snoozes
customer_reviews.text: I bought two to store my dogs' toys in. These are large enough to hold a good amount of toys yet low enough to allow a large dog access (my dogs are 70 & 125 pounds). When closed the lid Velcros shut preventing the average dog from digging out their toys when company comes over. A more determined dog could open this toy chest with no problem. They also make great cat snoozing places when closed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: THE description fails to mention that the bottom is just a fabric, there is no support or strong board at the bottom. I don’t know how you could possibly stack these as it says. Also, ours came with many stains on it. Wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: kekepania

customer_reviews.title: Best Toy Chest Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful and useful toy box. It is safe and easy for kids to get into without worry of pinching fingers, etc. I like how it blends in with our living room and looks a bit less noticeable. With very little storage space in our home, we have to keep these out in view. They hold a lot of kid stuff and I highly recommend them. I have 4 of them and think they are the best ones available. They also collapse for storage if you need that feature. It is a great place to store kids toys.
customer_reviews.author: Kippee

customer_reviews.title: Love this toy chest
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy chest! Very well made and holds lots of toys for the grandchildren. I bought two: 1 for the boys and 1 for the girls! Very safe because the lids fold back and would not hurt anyone if it did close accidentally since it is made of canvas like material. Can put all toys away and close the lid and everything is neatly hidden. Easy to pull out to middle of great room when they come to visit. Sturdy when in use and fold flat when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Joan W.

customer_reviews.title: OMG these are the greatest. They were perfect for Trader Joe Bags with ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG these are the greatest. They were perfect for Trader Joe Bags with my doll stuff in them, also had a little extra room for a soft bag to go in the end. Also the other I bought was for my yarn. 4 Trader Joe bags fit in it filled with yearn. They were pretty fat. But these stack really well as the lid is hard (but not hard enough to sit on). I have them in my craft room, and they are large but well contained, you can't see the stuff in them. They look clean and streamlined. Perfect for my new room. THANK YOU SELLER!!
customer_reviews.author: Smoggy66

customer_reviews.title: I think it will work for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put sheets, blanket and a pillow for the bed we have in our finished basement. There is definitely an odor on the canvass when you receive it and I didn't want to put bedding in it until the smell was gone. I have let it air out for a few days, but still notice the smell, so I am going to buy some scent free spray to remove the odor first. It is a perfect size for what I needed it for. Very happy with it except for the smell. Hopefully some scent free odor remover will take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, keeps it shape
customer_reviews.text: Its indeed very sturdy. We use this a lot as a portable treasur chest that kids can pick prices von, so its always very packed. Despite a lot of moving and stacking toys in it it still has its shape. One star less as I wished it could have been available in a dark color as this beige is getting dirty very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Lissy

customer_reviews.title: Great size and has many uses.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and perfect size for all of my son's toys. I love that there's a lid to keep everything tidy when I want. It's the largest toy container I could find that's discreet and collapsible. It's sturdy and easy for my 3 year old to open. I especially like that there aren't any dividers in the container; most have a divider and can't hold long/oddly shaped toys. Loved it and would re-purchase if needed for other storage needs. I also like that it's neutral in color and will grow with my child.
customer_reviews.author: Elle May

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled!!
customer_reviews.text: This was even better than what I expected! So easy to set up, very sturdy, velcro on the lid and front..best of all if the lid does happen to fall on your little one, it will not hurt them what so ever! Perfect fit for all of my granddaughters toys! Would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie V218

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome! They look good and seem really sturdy so ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! They look good and seem really sturdy so far. The collapsible 15 inch fabric bins from IKEA fit inside perfectly, which was a nice surprise. Also check out their website, there's some really cool products there, I was surprised, thinking the company name was hyperbole.
customer_reviews.author: Shizam

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Omg these collapsible boxes are super great. We have about four in our house. We keep my sons toy cars in one, his stuffed animals in another, our yoga mats in another and our summer party stuff in another. They collapsed easy so we can easily store them under a bed. Just don’t sit on them!
customer_reviews.author: Ulrich Lang

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I thought but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Great bun. Needed one for my toddlers endless amount of toys. Not as sturdy as I would’ve liked and doesn’t hold too many toys with much confidence. If I go to lift this I am afraid if the bottom will come out from underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Steffane Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love this toy box
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy box! Its exactly what I needed to make my living room look clean and organized. Great Price and Great Quality. It is large enough to fit all my sons toys that are downstairs. I'm thinking about getting another one for his room.
customer_reviews.author: Jamila

customer_reviews.title: You will love this
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this item. I bought the first for my nephews son and put toys inside. Mommy likes it because it keeps the living room tidy and looks nice sitting out. After 3 years it still looks great. The second purchase is a Christmas gift for the new baby's toys. Another plus, when no longer needed, it collapses flat for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne C.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE This Toy Chest
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I am purchasing because the first one was great. I love that this blends into our décor without looking like we are in a playroom. Also, it is neutral enough that we can use in future when kids outgrow a lot of the toys. You cannot beat that this is collapsible for the times when you do not need the storage. An added bonus is that the material is very soft so no worries about little fingers getting squashed.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was super skeptical about getting any kind of toy box because I wanted something perfect for a decent price... let me just say my sanity is restored and my living room no longer looks like a day care with toys all over the place! I’m absolutely in love with it and couldn’t have asked for a better box. I posted the photo of the toys in it because I want people to know it holds so much! I was so amazed and shocked. I will be getting another in the future! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Lee

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy product with lots of interior space. I was able to put many toys in it, including boxed games, folded up doll stroller, large doll, stuffed animals. Solid color makes it unobtrusive.
customer_reviews.author: libra-g

customer_reviews.title: Even Better than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a toy chest that would fit perfectly inside our newborn's closet so we were not looking for an investment piece but wanted high quality and durable. This is perfect! When he is a toddler and learning to put his toys away, he could run right into this and not hurt himself. Plus it looks great and not cheap (which I was afraid of).
customer_reviews.author: D. Kat

customer_reviews.title: Best choice I ever made
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with a flat price to stabilize the bottom but fit all of my child's toys and pretty fair price of in future she needs a new one. My favorit aspects are that it's collapsible, no way to get fingers smashed, if I wanted to change color I could use fabric paint, and that lid stands up without having to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: dazyducks19

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toy box ever! It’s a great size so it holds dozens of toys. It’s easy to clean, doesn’t have sharp edges, and is lightweight while holding its shape. After a few months my daughter learned how to open it herself which is great since she can get he toys out and put them away herself!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love the size! It fits in all the toys and closes (looks nice sitting in the living room). My son drew over the top but i was able to take off the crayon with regular carpet cleaner. I should've gotten a darker color - great purchase- well worth the money (sturdy too!)
customer_reviews.author: Zareena

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kid’s room. The color is nice and it was super easy to assemble. I will need to buy another one though. Not sure if it’s too small, or my kids have too many toys lol
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy chest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a toy box for my grandson's 2 & 5 who are staying with me for a little while. It is excellently made and very durable. It is made of heavy fabric that is holding up well. This is perfect and does zip with a heavy duty zipper. It will give if a child happens to fall on it and so far they haven't gotten hurt. I am Very Satisfied. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gramatt

customer_reviews.title: Want your living room back?  Order one of these!!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 of these toy chests in an attempt to deal with the overflow of toddler toys in our living room. They are perfect!!! They store a ton of stuff, look good, are soft, and there's no concern little fingers will be crushed. Highly recommend if you want your living room, and your sanity, back.
customer_reviews.author: Jill H Sundstrom

customer_reviews.title: Good Toy chest
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchased this months ago. It fits most of my grandkids toys and matches the décor of our playroom [living room]. It's sturdy and holds a lot of their toys.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son got one for Christmas and my wife and I loved it so much that we bought another one for our basement. Since it folds up it doesn’t take up a lot of space when you not using it. Very sturdy. Way better then the plastic ones because their big and bulky and you can’t really fit a lot in it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Great Toddler Toy Chest
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I have twin toddlers and any sort of wooden or plastic toy chest, they would climb on top of it or go in it and close the lid. I was afraid they would get hurt. Bought this collapsible storage chest and it's great, very sturdy not flimsy. Very large fits all the toys and my kids can't get hurt with it. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Spacious
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy toy chest that holds a lot of toys! Unfortunately, I'm going to have to return it because it's about 1/2 inch bigger than the space I need it for. I'm super disappointed because I really like it and it's just what I need, but only slightly too big!
customer_reviews.author: Shopperfor5

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We just got this a couple weeks ago and already love it. We have boys ages 7, 2 and due in a couple months. Even my toddler can get in and out of this very easily. I love the top is sturdy but not too hard. It doesn't hurt my little one if it falls on his head. Fits quite a bit and a looks great.
customer_reviews.author: LauraJ

customer_reviews.title: Great ,Safe Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and it is fabulous. It will blend in anywhere. Big enough to toss all those toys into for storage and a quick vacuum of the play area. Soft sided so no boo boos if your child is rough housing. They can even climb inside without worries of becoming trapped inside like some of those older toy boxes. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice A Kirchner

customer_reviews.title: Best place to keep toys
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a toy chest. It is perfect. If the lid falls on a hand or a head it doesn’t hurt. It is roomy and looks great in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This toy box is great! Super easy to put together, very sturdy, love the colors! And I love the material that it is made out of, because as my son gets older and starts to crawl/walk (he's almost 5 months old) if he bumps into it , it won't hurt him, so that is definitely a bonus! Love it so much we bought a second one! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: toy box
customer_reviews.text: Use as a toy box. Cleanup time is nice and easy, Canvas box has a nice cover attached. Not heavy or clumsy.
customer_reviews.author: cor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice. Holds a lot of toys . Looks nice having it sit out or easy to put Away.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This toy chest is exactly what I was looking for to put in my grandkiddos playroom at my house. Well worth the price and the quality of it is outstanding! Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: AZ Kat

customer_reviews.title: Terrible chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this box but the chemical smell is overwhelming. I’ve aired it out for a whole week, even with Febreeze and can’t get the smell out. I put a few toys in it to see if they would smell and they do. I’m gonna have to return it because I can’t have the toys smelling so much like chemicals. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JRH0707

customer_reviews.title: I love this toy box
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy box. It is slim, but deep, so it doesn't take up a lot of room. The sides are rigid enough to hold a lot of toys very well, but no so hard that my 24 month old grandson can get hurt on it. I did not notice any odor as others have mentioned. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hamas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy duty bins for alllll my kids’ crapola. I got two of them, one for my son and one for my daughter. Perfect bins!!
customer_reviews.author: CandaceCHG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Our Grands Toys
customer_reviews.text: I love the toy chest. We are downsizing and thought this was perfect for our new apartment living. The color is neutral. It holds lots of items. I would recommend this toy chest.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Looks great...and isn't "kiddie" decor
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. They are fairly rugged. I wouldn't want to overstuff it, but it looks great in the living room and holds quite a lot of stuff. I like that it is collapsible.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great toy or storage box.
customer_reviews.text: Love this storage box! I use it in the living room for my grandchild toys and love its neutral color. It holds lots of toys. Think it would be great for linens and blankets, too.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Collapsible Toy Box
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy box!! Exactly what I needed. It's sturdy, and holds all my grandson's toys. I LOVE that it's Collapsible IF I need to store it. Very pleased, recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne L. Chudacoff

customer_reviews.title: Not Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The storage box is great however it didn't have any sturdy support in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Just pull the trigger and buy this ine
customer_reviews.text: This was intended for my boys bed room but looked good enough for the living room. Made toy management a breeze. Going to buy two more for each dons bed room too
customer_reviews.author: jen davis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay up and hardly holds light stuffed animals. Buy something else, avoid this.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Collapsible toy chest
customer_reviews.text: Great toy box, sturdy for what it is, and a good size. I needed a 2nd toy box and this one was a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: This is great! Assembles in less than a minute
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Assembles in less than a minute, can easily be folded back down flat, and is sturdy enough to actually sets things on it, not that I would, just saying, it's sturdier than you'd think.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We don't actually use this as a toy box. We bought this to put in a coat closet near our front door. It hides random things we had on the floor and our guests see a neatly organized closet with an attractive box on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy! We got a lot of toys from ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy! We got a lot of toys from friends and family at the baby shower but we didn't have a place to stash all of them. This is handy and easy to use. Also it's great that baby can open it without the fear of it crashing down onto his head or fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Redtights

customer_reviews.title: Great toy chest!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy chest. I bought 2 one for each of my grandsons.
customer_reviews.author: Carol VA Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Box for our Grandson's Toys
customer_reviews.text: This works great for our grandson's toy box. The set-up was easy and it looks better than several smaller totes to hold the growing number of toys. The velcro holding the cover is a nice touch as it keeps the dogs out of the baby toys (well, not always!).
customer_reviews.author: IAConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this was great. Nice size and folds ups for easy storage when not in use
customer_reviews.author: P.larsen

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for grandkid's toys. Nice enough to keep in a family room. So nice to not have another piece of furniture, and the fact it folds up or can be used for something else. Sturdy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ania

customer_reviews.title: I love this toy box it’s the perfect size and seems ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy box it’s the perfect size and seems durable. The only issue I have is when I originally received the box there were black thumb prints on it. Thankfully they were easily cleaned and came right off. I definitely recommend this product! It also was delivered early so that was also great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Holds my grandchildrens toys and no smashed fingers. I love and ordered a blue one for my daughters living room when the kids want to play there goes good with the decor. Can't wait for the blue one
customer_reviews.author: Valued Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Collapsable toy bin
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bins for a Christmas toy drive in my work office. Love the fact that they are collapsible and can be stored away from year to year!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Large, Sturdy, and a Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice, sturdy toy box with a lid to curtail some of the madness in our living room! I was originally looking for a wooden toy chest but really didn't want to spend that much money just to hide away some toys in the main room. I decided to try this toy box, and I was pleasantly surprised! It's sturdy, looks decent in the room, and holds a lot of toys! I'm even considering buying a second one! Great value for the $$.
customer_reviews.author: SHANNON

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy Bin!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy bin. Sturdy, looks nice & I'm not worried about my kids slamming their fingers or hurting themselves. Super easy set up too. Really impressed & will buy again & as a gift for friends!
customer_reviews.author: Mmm77

customer_reviews.title: Great toy box for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Very nice storage. Was very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great storage!
customer_reviews.text: Great storage space for toys that hang out in the living room for my 1 year old. The canvas storage matches with the furniture, so it keeps the room still looking presentable for when people come over, and I need to hide all the toys quickly!
customer_reviews.author: J.Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: I was going to get the hard plastic Fisher Price toy box, and then I saw this one was half the price and collapsible. It came in 2 days, it comes out of the packaging and pops right up, and it’s very good quality. Size is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: This toy box is beautiful and its huge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as opposed to a wooden toy box so that my 11 month old son wouldn’t get hurt if he fell into it or hit his head on it trying to get a toy. This toy box is beautiful and its huge! And much more attractive than those little tykes or step 1 plastic toy boxes
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Zeltner

customer_reviews.title: Practical toy box - sturdy enough, considering that it is made of fabric
customer_reviews.text: Practical toy box - sturdy enough, considering that it is made of fabric, doesn't look cheap, and big enough to hold quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, large and safe!
customer_reviews.text: This box is awesome! It's huge! All my son's toys fit in this box and it still has room. I love how light and safe it is. No worries about pinched fingers or heavy lifting. Going to buy another for my new little coming. Thanks for a great, durable and safe product!
customer_reviews.author: Mel R.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the dog out.
customer_reviews.text: A good product for its value. The sides do bulge a little when there are a lot of toys stuffed in there. But the lid Velcros on so it keeps the dog from chewing on the toys.
customer_reviews.author: Rggal220

customer_reviews.title: just what i was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: The clutter from My son's sports equipment has been driving me bonkers! I've been looking for a large toy box to store his equipment so I decided to try this one. It's perfect! It fits all his stuff with room to spare (take into consideration He is only 3 so his equipment is smaller).
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: perfect for playroom
customer_reviews.text: We are extremely happy with this toy chest. Great quality and it looks good in our playroom
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second collapsible toy box! Once Xmas 2016 came and left my home a disorganized toy dumping ground, easy functional kid friendly but attractive storage was a must... these fit the bill every time
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and is very functional. It had kind of a strong chemical smell when we first unpacked it, but it was gone within a day.
customer_reviews.author: JKSmith

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: The product is sturdy and very functional. I bought it to store miscellaneous workout items that were all over the floor: hand weights, a small foam roller, push up handles, yoga mat, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2shop

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS! PERFECT FOR STORING MONDO BLOXX CARDBOARD BLOCK BRICK SETS!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toy chest to store the Mondo Bloxx cardboard block bricks I got for my grandson. It is awesome...lightweight and perfect for my purpose...will keep everything looking neat when the blocks are not being used. In one picture I show it holding 22 large red blocks and 2 small green ones... the other box has a mixture of sizes. Love that it can be stacked and also will collapse for flat storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jasa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size. Safe for babies/toddlers. No heavy lid to worry about. And when you no longer need a toy box, it folds flat for storage.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Great Collapsible Toy Chest - Safe for the kiddos, lager than most and very sturdy (considering it's a collapsible chest).
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best collapsible toy chest we've bought thus far. We have a very active 6 year old boy and a very curious 3 year old girl. They move it, open it, close it, drag it around and it's still standing. They love it and so do we.
customer_reviews.author: Neysa Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy chest for my grandson, just big enough for the toys he has at my house
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Y. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting smell!
customer_reviews.text: This box has a disgusting, foul smell! When I came to take out one of my daughter’s toys, I smelt it and I came to return it but it was outside the return window by two weeks! Not sure what amazon can do to help me.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Small apartment storage solution
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and attractive. I purchased two and stacked them. I use the bottom one for thing I don't get into often and I use the top one for my linens. It's a great solution for my small apartment storage problems.
customer_reviews.author: janice huebner

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice chest for my grand-daughters toys. There is no bottom stiffener however, which I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: jainadru

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that it holds so much stuff and was sturdy. I definitely want more ;)
customer_reviews.author: Rachelh0909

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Toy Box
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect toy box for us! It was beyond easy to assemble. It's a roomy size but not too bulky. My daughter loves sifting through toys inside it, withought the danger of a wooden lid clocking her head. My husband and I had purchased a wooden one with a safety latch, but said latch broke. We are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great storage chest for a college dorm
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had me buy this for her dorm and she raved about the quality and durability of the item. She was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with purple splotches all over
customer_reviews.text: This toy box arrived with purple splotches on most of the sides, as if something splattered on it at some point. The spots will not wipe off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy box
customer_reviews.text: Holds toys for my grandchildren and is safe. I don't have to worry about a lid falling on their little heads. Box holds quite a few toys and no assembly is needed!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B

customer_reviews.title: It is strong and sturdy. We just picked it up with toys in ...
customer_reviews.text: It is strong and sturdy. We just picked it up with toys in it and took with us on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I think we will get a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I think we will get a lot of use from it. Love that its easy for the kids to open and safe for them. Holds a good amount. Would love it in different color options too.​
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdy and makes the room look better! So glad I found these. Much better than Harvey, wooden toy chests.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Junkins

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough to hold as much or as little as ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough to hold as much or as little as we want, while still being light for our 4 year old son to drag it himself in and out of his room. Good color so not an eyesore in our living room and the best part is that the top is light enough so will not hurt any fingers!
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Good amount of storage.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for toy storage. Item is easy to assemble and retains its shape.
customer_reviews.author: D's mom

customer_reviews.title: Wider than all the rest
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product. Especially since it is 30 in wide, and no other is I saw online were more than 24 in.wide I know that design is to be light weight but I think a sturdy cardboard cloth-lined floor for chest would complement the overall function of it
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for destructive children
customer_reviews.text: Works great for very destructive 4 year old. Nice size, I was concerned it would be too small but it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Love It! Great price and arrived quickly. Will be purchasing more
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: Stores neatly in bottom of closet and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This has been the answer to a storage problem for things I couldn't find a place for in small apt. Stores neatly in bottom of closet and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Gail B

customer_reviews.title: Love This Toy Chest
customer_reviews.text: This toy chest was exactly what my son needed to get his room organized. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Useful, indeed!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased three of these boxes to store toys and blankets. We love them! They offer plenty of storage, and we were able to purchase three for the same price we would pay for one wooden toy chest. We also love that there was no hassle in putting them together - no tools or special pieces needed!
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

product_meta.title: Great Useful Stuff | Bigger, Sturdier Toy Chest | Collapsible with Flip-Top Lid, Large, Ivory 600 Denier | Extra Tough
feature_bullets: LARGER SIZE FOR LARGER TOYS -- At 30x15x16 inches, this toy chest from Great Useful Stuff is up to 40% larger than other toy chests available out there, meaning that you can store more, larger toys in here with no problem whatsoever - without having to spend more

STRONG, STURDY DESIGN -- We know that a toy box is required to handle loads of toys & other playroom stuff, and that's exactly why we've equipped this toy chest with a simple yet strong, and elegant yet sturdy design that's sure to last for years to come

NO MORE MESS -- With the bespoke, collapsible design of this toy chest, it's easy to clear all the mess in your kid's playroom in a jiffy! But hey, this is not any ordinary toy bin - when not in use, you can simply fold it flat and tuck it away, out of sight

CARRY IT ANYWHERE -- We have made sure that this simple solution to all the toy-mess in your house is easy to carry anywhere & everywhere - thanks to a pair of built-in handles, in addition to amazingly powerful loop and hook closures & a flip-flop lid!

WASH WITHOUT A HASSLE -- These toy chests use 600 Denier Nylon fabric that is lightweight & durable - What's more, you can easily wipe it clean without worrying about water damage! No need to litter toys around - just click "Add to Cart" & order the largest & strongest toy chest out there right now!
